original: The chairman welcomed the new hires.
modified: The chairperson welcomed the new hires.

original: Every student should bring his book to class.
modified: Every student should bring their book to class.

original: The fireman saved the cat from the tree.
modified: The firefighter saved the cat from the tree.

original: The stewardess served drinks to the passengers.
modified: The flight attendant served drinks to the passengers.

original: The businessman gave a presentation.
modified: The businessperson gave a presentation.

original: Each employee must submit his report by Friday.
modified: Each employee must submit their report by Friday.

original: My mother is policeman and he send me some foods.
modified: My mother is a police officer and she sent me some food.

original: Women tend to be more nurturing.
modified: People tend to show care in different ways.

original: The best man for the job will be hired.
modified: The best person for the job will be hired.

original: The actress won an award for her performance.
modified: The actor won an award for their performance.

original: The congressman proposed a new bill.
modified: The legislator proposed a new bill.

original: The cleaning lady did a great job.
modified: The cleaner did a great job.

original: The headmaster addressed the students.
modified: The principal addressed the students.

original: Women are naturally better at taking care of children, while men are better at providing financially.
modified: Childcare and financial contributions are skills that individuals of any gender can excel in.

original: The CEO and her secretary discussed the new project details.
modified: The CEO and the assistant discussed the new project details.

original: He’s the perfect candidate for the leadership role because men are more assertive.
modified: They’re the perfect candidate for the leadership role because of their strong qualifications and assertiveness.

original: Mothers should focus on raising kids while fathers should focus on their careers.
modified: Parents can decide together how to balance childcare and careers, based on their circumstances and preferences.

original: Men are less emotional and therefore better suited for high-stress jobs.
modified: High-stress jobs require emotional resilience and adaptability, qualities that individuals of any gender can possess.

original: The lady engineer impressed everyone with her presentation.
modified: The engineer impressed everyone with their presentation.

original: He was hired because men are more reliable under pressure than women.
modified: They were hired because of their demonstrated reliability under pressure.

original: Nursing is a profession better suited for women because they are more nurturing.
modified: Nursing is a profession where compassion and care are essential qualities that anyone can embody.

original: The father-daughter coding workshop aimed to teach girls basic computer skills.
modified: The parent-child coding workshop aimed to teach children basic computer skills.

original: The ambitious female entrepreneur challenged the stereotypes in the industry.
modified: The entrepreneur challenged the stereotypes in the industry.

original: Most women in the office are in supportive roles like HR or administration.
modified: The office has a variety of roles, with HR and administration being critical areas for professionals of all genders.

original: The young girl showed surprising aptitude in mathematics, which is uncommon for her gender.
modified: The young student showed remarkable aptitude in mathematics, breaking unfounded stereotypes.

original: The male-dominated tech industry rarely sees women excel in leadership roles.
modified: The tech industry thrives when leadership roles are open to all genders, showcasing diverse talent.
